remarks: Cancel equal divisors in a division.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
div1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divmuld.4 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
divdiv23d.5 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
divcan7d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / C ) / ( B / C ) ) = ( A / B ) ) $.
